experience.title: Ecosia

experience.title: Blip.ai
experience.description: worked as a front-end intern in the chatbot building platform BLiP.ai using frameworks AngularJS and VueJS, provided solutions on Artificial Intelligence using Python, and analyzed NLP models based on intents and entities.

presentations.title: The Developer's Conference
presentations.description: How to develop an application to solve a recurring NLP problem using the Word Embedding algorithm? We are going to explore the spell check task.

presentations.title: Developer Circle
presentations.description: To use words in mathematical models, we rely on transforming them into some form of numerical representation. One of many algorithms that perform such task is the Word Embedding.

about: I like to use my skills to help communities, improve people's lives, and overall create a better world. I am already very lucky that I work for an environmental focused company, planting trees in a lot of countries.

I have 6+ years of front-end experience, mostly with Vue and Angular, and I'm also learning React to up my skills. I also have some machine learning knowledge and experience, although it's not my focus area.
My main interests are code architecture and code quality, and CSS animations. I am proficient in both JavaScript and TypeScript, and I have a good grasp of Python and MySQL.

areas.title: Volunteering
areas.text: If you represent a non-profit organization in search of volunteers to pick up some work, please don't hesitate to contact me. I'll be happy to lend my expertise for free on my spare time if our goals align.

areas.title: Mentoring
areas.text: If you are from an underprivileged or discriminated group and in search for a mentor, please get in touch. I will be glad to offer mentorship, or have a small chat. I have helped a few free minority-aimed initiatives in the past, as a support for programming teachers.

projects.title: sq-learn
projects.description: The goal of sq-learn is to help everyone who wants to learn queries in SQL by having an intuitive interface to visualize the database.
